message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I am willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your desire to work within a budget.  While I believe this product is worth significantly more, I'm willing to come down to $1,225,000. This feels like a fair compromise to ensure you get access to its benefits.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I am able to offer $1,175,000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
